attributes.additional_details:
In this country we spend £398 million on Art, I feel this is a complete waste of money. This money would be better spent on the NHS or the police or any number of things which are practical.

While I would never ban art I would never want public money to be spent on something which serves no purpose, apart from making the artist rich.

I have a for you to look at so you can see how much money the governement is wasting on Art and other things.

http://www.theguardian.com/news/datablog/2012/dec/04/government-spending-department-2011-12

We 10,000 signature the government have to respond, with 100,000 signature the government have to debate it.

You can make the difference if only you sign.
